item.title: Dog Fouling, 17th December
item.description:

item.title: Bed frame and rubbish fly-tipped, 17th December
item.description:

item.title: Abandoned vehicle in Faro Close, 17th December
item.description:
This has been here for several months now. It is a red Toyota Argo. Contact with DVLA made and they have advised that they have no knowledge of the car/ registration number on their records. They believe that the number plates are false.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Faro Close, Bickley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytip concrete blocks, 17th December
item.description:
About 20 concrete blocks fly tipped behind bushes/hedges in Willett Recreation Ground. Blocks well concealed and may have been there for months. Friends have barrowed the blocks to the car park for easy collection.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crossway, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog fouling, 17th December
item.description:
Yet another dog poo. Can this problem be resolved once and for all? It happens every week. Kids go up and down this street every morning and afternoon. It is a health risk.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clarence Mews, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
